code:
flowchart TB
  S0((Tier 2 threshold met))
  S1[Create/Update Tier 2 case]
  S2[Attach checklist: T2_PLAN_DEFAULT]
  S3[Assign owner]
  S4[Confirm data + patterns (AM/PM)]
  S5[Barrier assessment]
  S6[Guardian contact + response logged]
  S7[Create attendance plan (goals + supports)]
  S8[Create follow-up tasks + set review date]
  S9{Required items complete?}
  S10[Allow Tier 2 plan marked "Active"]
  S11((End))
  S12[Block promotion / show missing items]

  S0 --> S1 --> S2 --> S3 --> S4 --> S5 --> S6 --> S7 --> S8 --> S9
  S9 -- Yes --> S10 --> S11
  S9 -- No --> S12 --> S9

%% ===============================
%% Pilot rollout timeline (high level)
%% ===============================
timeline
  title Ireland MVP Pilot Rollout (suggested)
  2026-02 : Pilot design + DPIA + policy pack defaults
  2026-03 : Onboard 3-5 post-primary schools (existing customers)
  2026-04 : Run live pilot (daily action + tier2 plans + comms)
  2026-05 : Evaluate KPIs + iterate (thresholds, templates, UX)
  2026-06 : Expand to 10-20 schools + ETB dashboard pilot
